author: AddictedToStyrene
title: GoKart!
review: This is a cute and simple little set that has a little in common with classic space buggies. Although the size of Lego cars has been increasing in recent years, this would still be OK as a GoKart or similar on a little track. At least it doesn't have a juniorised one-piece chassis like some late '90s sets!

author: hustla187
title: Not Bad
review: This is actaully very good for a little Lego go kart or a race buggy as they call it. It does look more of a go kart than this race buggy. White and yellow make the color cordination OK, but only deserves a 4.

author: asianlego
title: Mini Racin'
review: I got this buggy as part of a promo pack and I think that this vehicle rocks. It's simplified design shows that a few pieces can make a huge difference. I wished they'd put a proper front bumper, though. The minifig is the usual 'cool boy with sunglasses' kid and is sporting a red Octan racing jumpsuit. The vehicle moves very smoothly and you don't hear any little squeaks as you might do from other tyres.
